text: Meredith Brooks (born June 12, 1958) is an American singer, songwriter and guitarist. She was born in Oregon City, Oregon. She is best known for her 1997 single "Bitch" which reached No.6 in the UK and No.2 in the United States. ==References== Category:Musicians from Oregon Category:Singers from Oregon Category:Living people Category:1958 births
title: Meredith Brooks
